tool_description: Free feed with IOCs -  malicious URLs, domains, IPs, and hashes. [Website: https://tweetfeed.live]
title: TweetFeed

api_list.name: v1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tweetfeed.p.rapidapi.com/v1/{time}/{filter1}/{filter2}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tweetfeed.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: time
parameters.description:
Select 1 of these timeframes:

**today** - Today starting 00:00 UTC)
**week** - Last 7 days
**month** - Last 30 days
**year** - Last 365 days

parameters.name: filter1
parameters.description:
Can be an specific user, type or tag:

Type → **url** / **domain** / **ip** / **sha256** / **md5**
Tag → **phishing** / **ransomware** / **CobaltStrike** ...
User → **@malwrhunterteam** / **@1ZRR4H** / **@MBThreatIntel** / ... (don't forget the @)

parameters.name: filter2
parameters.description:
Can be an specific user, type or tag:

Type → **url** / **domain** / **ip** / **sha256** / **md5**
Tag → **phishing** / **ransomware** / **CobaltStrike** ...
User → **@malwrhunterteam** / **@1ZRR4H** / **@MBThreatIntel** / ... (don't forget the @)

utterances.utterance: Show me the malicious URLs detected today.
What phishing activities have been reported in the last week?
Give me the list of domains flagged for ransomware this month.
Fetch the IPs associated with CobaltStrike in the past year.
Can you provide the SHA256 hashes reported by @malwrhunterteam today?
List the MD5 hashes related to phishing from the last 30 days.
What are the malicious URLs shared by @MBThreatIntel this week?
Show me the domains tagged with ransomware today.
Get the list of IPs flagged for phishing in the last year.
What SHA256 hashes have been reported by @1ZRR4H this month?
